node.statement: Untwisted sector projectors (eq 2.7): P_1^{(1)} = (1/(1+xi^2))(id + xi*tau) and P_1^{(2)} = (1/(1+xi^{-2}))(id - xi^{-1}*tau). Verify: (a) idempotency P^2=P using tau^2 = id + tau (i.e., tau eigenvalue xi satisfies xi^2 = 1+xi); (b) orthogonality P^{(1)}P^{(2)}=0; (c) completeness P^{(1)}+P^{(2)}=id (check: coefficients sum to [1,0]).
